data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Flamengo to take a throw-in in Fortaleza territory.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Throw-in for Flamengo in the half of Fortaleza.
Fortaleza will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Flamengo.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Flamengo.
Mauricio Isla (Flamengo) has received a yellow card from Rafael Traci.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Flamengo have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 8, Fortaleza needs to be cautious. Flamengo have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Flamengo.
Rafael Traci signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Flamengo's half.
In the minute 11, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Fortaleza drives forward and David gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Felipe for Fortaleza gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 12, Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bruno Henrique (Flamengo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Gerson gets his shot on target but fails to score for Flamengo.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Flamengo just outside Fortaleza's area.
In the minute 17, Flamengo are coming forward and Mauricio Isla gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Rafael Traci awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
In the minute 18, Rafael Traci signals a throw-in for Fortaleza, close to Flamengo's area.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Flamengo.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 21, It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
Free kick Flamengo.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Fortaleza.
In the minute 23, Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Free kick Fortaleza.
Throw-in for Flamengo at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 25, Throw-in Flamengo.
Fortaleza awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
In the minute 29, Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
Rafael Traci signals a Flamengo throw-in in Fortaleza's half.
Throw-in for Flamengo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Fortaleza.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Flamengo's half?
In the minute 36, Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
Fortaleza surge into the attack at Estadio Castelao but Tingaâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Flamengo at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 37, In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Flamengo have been given a penalty at Estadio Castelao...
Jackson for Fortaleza has been booked by Rafael Traci and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
In the minute 42, Flamengo are awarded a penalty at Estadio Castelao. Pedro takes the kick ... But misses!
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Fortaleza.
Ronald (Fortaleza) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Flamengo.
Fortaleza are pushing forward but Joao Paulo's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 45, Flamengo have a goal kick.
Fortaleza's Tinga gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
In the minute 45, Rafael Traci blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Gerson of Flamengo gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 46, Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Rafael Traci awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Flamengo.
In the minute 48, In Fortaleza Fortaleza attack through Romarinho. The finish is off target, however.
Rafael Traci awards Flamengo a goal kick.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 51, David for Fortaleza is whistled offside.
Rafael Traci awards the home team a throw-in.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Flamengo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Fortaleza in Fortaleza.
Rafael Traci signals a Flamengo throw-in in Fortaleza's half.
In the minute 59, It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
In the minute 61, Flamengo's Willian Arao misses with an attempt on goal.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
In the minute 62, Osvaldo is replacing Joao Paulo for the home team.
The home team have replaced David with Wellington Paulista. This is the second substitution made today by Marcelo Chamusca.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
In the minute 64, Felipe for Fortaleza drives towards goal at Estadio Castelao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Flamengo at Estadio Castelao.
Flamengo's Bruno Henrique breaks free at Estadio Castelao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 65, Rafael Traci awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Free kick Fortaleza.
In the minute 68, Fortaleza have a goal kick.
Fortaleza push upfield and Tinga gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Flamengo defence.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 71, Flamengo pushes forward through Pedro, whose finish on goal is saved.
Felipe of Fortaleza gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Flamengo at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 72, Diego is on a sub for Willian Arao for Flamengo.
Rogerio Ceni is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Castelao with Vitinho replacing Everton Ribeiro.
Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 73, Throw-in Fortaleza.
Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
In the minute 74, Fortaleza have a dangerous throw-in.
Flamengo needs to be cautious. Fortaleza have an attacking throw-in.
Gabriel Dias is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 77, Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
Fortaleza awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mariano Vazquez (Fortaleza) has replaced the possibly injured Gabriel Dias.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Fortaleza in their own half.
Fortaleza's Carlinhos has been booked in Fortaleza.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Flamengo.
In the minute 80, In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Fortaleza are in shooting range from this free kick.
Rene for Flamengo has been booked by Rafael Traci and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 84, Jackson of Fortaleza smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Fortaleza.
Marcelo Chamusca (Fortaleza) is making a fourth substitution, with Derley replacing Ronald.
In the minute 85, Bergson is replacing Romarinho for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Flamengo.
Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
In the minute 88, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Fortaleza.
The away team have replaced Giorgian De Arrascaeta with Pepe. This is the third substitution made today by Rogerio Ceni.
In the minute 88, At Estadio Castelao, Vitinho for the away team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Flamengo.
Can Flamengo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fortaleza's half?
Rafael Traci will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 0-0.
